query: Cedar Blitz gravel race Cedar Springs

videos.title: Cedar Blitz Gravel Race 2024 - 36 Mile (4k)
videos.description:
This is my view of the 2024 Cedar Blitz Gravel Race, which takes place in Cedar Springs, MI. This race is the 36 mile distance, starting and finishing in front of Cedar Springs Brewing Company on Main St. in Cedar Springs. The race took place on July 13, 2024, with the weather being a toasty 75F, calm, and humid at the starting line.

This course is quite flat, allowing for high speeds and solid drafting tactics. I ended up in a great group a couple miles into the gravel, and we worked together for most of the race. With a few miles left, five of us decided to crank up the pace a little and broke off the front. I ended up hitting a wall after a few turns on the front but then did my best to beat that pack I had ridden with to the finish line.

This was an awesome event, so kudos to Rogue Racing Promotions for their efforts in putting this together and running a top-notch event!

Cameras: GoPro Hero 11 (front), GoPro Hero 9 (back)
Bike: 2024 Intense 951 Gravel

0:00 - Neutral Roll Out
7:45 - Start of the Gravel
11:40 - Early Groups
16:00 - Myers Lake
19:35 - Back to Gravel
21:40 - Riding the Mid-pack Train
1:22:00 - Getting Organized on the Front
1:24:45 - Breaking Away From the Group
1:30:50 - Unable to Keep up the Pace
1:36:30 - Trying to Beat the Group to the Line

videos.title: Cedar Blitz Gravel Race 2024 34 Mile Lead Group
videos.description: Cedar Spring, MI hosted the 9th stop of the Michigan Gravel Race Series. Fast gravel, sunny skies and a downtown start/finish all pointed to a great race!

videos.title: Cedar Blitz - 50mi (Gravel Race) 2024
videos.description:
👉 Hey! SUBSCRIBE for free WATTS 👉 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsr-SU_SAqjrzmu4kXIRfUQ?sub_confirmation=1

The Cedar Blitz gravel race took place on July 13th, 2024 in Cedar Springs, MI. As part of the Michigan Gravel Race Series (MGRS) the "Long" course was the 50 mile version.  

The race started with a 2 mile neutral roll out until we hit the gravel.  Legs felt good and I was able to stay with the lead group. However, this group was quite big with 33 riders making it to the finish line. This was despite numerous attempts at breakaways throughout the race. The last mile into the finish line was pretty sketchy. I tried to make myself towards the front in the final couple miles knowing that there was a high speed chicane with some loose corners. I thought I was about top 10-15 wheels, but I was actually closer to 25th. So I was out of position and to make mattes worse we were passing riders from shorter race course distances. I had to do several mini sprints to make up spots and had nothing left for my actual sprint at the finish line.  I clawed back a few places and ended up 18th overall, just 6 seconds behind first.

Happy with the results but I actually got all time 3rd on the Strava segment "Cedar Blitz Final Sprint". Which means I had the power, I just messed up the lead in to the finish.  

👉 Hey! SUBSCRIBE for free WATTS 👉 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsr-SU_SAqjrzmu4kXIRfUQ?sub_confirmation=1
tags: extreme xc battle in the gravel

videos.title: Cedar Blitz 36 mile Gravel Race - (short vid)
videos.description:
The Cedar Blitz 36 Mile Gravel race in Cedar Springs, MI, on 13 July 2024. It was a fun little course with some nice fast roads, mild elevation changes, and a decent gravel/paved mix. Makes for a fast race.
I overheated, and both legs cramped up completely by the end of the race, but I finished. 
thus was my first time here. I'll definitely be back next year.

videos.title: Cedar Blitz 2025 Trailer
videos.description:
July 12, 2025 - Get ready to be a part of our legacy at The Cedar Blitz. 
.
It's time to take your shot at the podium, in one of the fastest growing Gravel races in the Michigan Gravel Series! Register now at www.cedarblitz.com.
.
Are you an expert cyclist or a casual cyclist?
Here at the Cedar Blitz, we encourage any and every skill level to compete and be a part of our event! Secure your slot for a chance to win cash prizes, medals, and more!
.
.
We have proudly organized this event for 5 years now! We would like to extend our appreciation and thanks from the Cedar Blitz Team, to all of our sponsors, racers, volunteers, and our crew members for making this such a meaningful and special event to the biking community.
.
.
All video, audio, and graphic production elements displayed were performed in-house by our production team here at the Cedar Blitz.
